item.title: Storms of Calethrax
item.description: One thousand years ago, a cabal of wizards convened to perform a ritual to reshape the world into a paradise. In their hubris, they failed and destroyed Calethraxâ€™s climate, dooming the world. Now the survivors live in constant fear, fleeing from powerful, arcane storms that ravage the lands. The Storms of Calethrax is a unique campaign setting for D&D 5e, OSR, or any other fantasy-based RPG. Calethrax is a world ravaged by powerful arcane storms that destroy nearly everything in its path.
